unnormalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hit Indian Roads!**
normalised: auto buzz: new wheels hit indian roads!

unnormalised: Namaste, gearheads! The automotive scene is buzzing like a Mumbai local right now! We've seen a flurry of vehicle launches this past week that'll make your chai spill.
normalised: namaste, gearheads! the automotive scene is buzzing like a mumbai local right now! we've seen a flurry of vehicle launches this past week that will make your chai spill.

unnormalised: First up, Tata Motors dropped the Altroz EV at the Auto Expo – sleek design, promising range. Then, Mahindra unveiled the ‘Scorpio N' facelift – beefier than ever! Experts at IIT Madras are already dissecting its engine.
normalised: first up, tata motors dropped the altroz e v at the auto expo – sleek design, promising range. then, mahindra unveiled the ‘scorpio n' facelift – beefier than ever! experts at I I T madras are already dissecting its engine.

unnormalised: Not to be left behind, Maruti Suzuki launched the new-gen WagonR with enhanced fuel efficiency - perfect for navigating those Delhi streets! They claim it can go almost 25 kmpl, which is fantastic!
normalised: not to be left behind, maruti suzuki launched the new-gen wagon R with enhanced fuel efficiency - perfect for navigating those delhi streets! they claim it can go almost twenty five kilometer per liter, which is fantastic!

unnormalised: The price wars are heating up too! Initial estimates suggest the Altroz EV will start around Rs. 12 Lakh. The updated Scorpio N is expected to retail starting at Rs. 15 Lakhs.
normalised: the price wars are heating up too! initial estimates suggest the altroz e v will start around rupee twelve lakh. the updated scorpio n is expected to retail starting at rupee fifteen lakhs.

unnormalised: Speaking of reveals, Kia showed off a concept SUV with a panoramic sunroof that’s bigger than my entire living room (which is roughly 200 sq ft, for reference). Keep your eyes peeled for official launches; this is just the start! Dr. Sharma from the Automotive Research Association of India seems pretty stoked about all the innovation.
normalised: speaking of reveals, kia showed off a concept S U V with a panoramic sunroof that is bigger than my entire living room (which is roughly two hundred square feet, for reference). keep your eyes peeled for official launches; this is just the start! doctor sharma from the automotive research association of india seems pretty stoked about all the innovation.
